mng: stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron, commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"

exm.mng: Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
Xu Xuan (-991), author of commentaries on Shuowen Jiezi 說文解字註|说文解字注[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4 Zhu4]
